vendor_name: La Cour des Consuls Hôtel & Spa Toulouse - MGallery
title: Toulouse Neo-Classical Elegance with Two Restaurants, Chic Cocktail Bar & Spa
description:
Uncover the irresistible charm of Toulouse, France's Pink City, with a sophisticated stay at this 18th-century townhouse. Step behind the boutique hotel's neo-classical facade of pink terracotta bricks and you'll discover a seamless blend of period architecture and contemporary French designs. 

Dine on gourmet French fare at Le Cénacle Restaurant, unwind in the relaxed ambience of Le Consuls Brasserie and unwind with a drink or two at Le 46, serving up myriad champagne and signature cocktails. For relaxation, the hotel's spa is where you should head, boasting rejuvenating treatments, a traditional hammam and a herbal tea room.
location_description: La Cour des Consuls Hôtel & Spa Toulouse - MGallery

title: Elegant French Escape in the Heart of Toulouse
description: Discover the charm of France’s ‘Pink City’, celebrated for its endless blushing brick buildings, with a lavish stay at the Crowne Plaza Toulouse, an IHG Hotel. This elegant hotel occupies a charismatic red-brick building and is set amongst the heritage streets lined with restaurants and boutiques. Spend your days wandering the dreamy terracotta scenery and classical French architecture, and get lost in the culture with lively trips to farmers' markets and jazz bars.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Toulouse, an IHG Hotel
